name: Deno
description: Deno aims to provide a productive and secure JavaScript and TypeScript runtime for the modern programmer. It is built on top of V8, Rust, and TypeScript.

name: TS Node
description: TypeScript execution and REPL for node.js, with source map support.

name: OpenJDK
description: Oracle remains committed to OpenJDK as the best open-source Java implementation and will continue to improve OpenJDK and welcome external contributors.

name: .NET Core runtime
description: .NET is a cross-platform runtime for cloud, IoT, and desktop apps.

name: HHVM
description: HHVM is an open-source virtual machine designed for executing programs written in Hack. HHVM uses a just-in-time (JIT) compilation approach to achieve great runtime performance while maintaining amazing development flexibility.

name: Scratch VM
description: Virtual Machine used to represent, run, and maintain the state of programs for Scratch 3.0.
